complaint.description: No customer care available. Website lacks information and support phone number is unresponsive. Requesting a call back is a frustrating process.
complaint.suggestion: Improve customer care by providing timely support and ensuring all necessary information is available on the website.

meta.review_content: Their ice cold website doesn't give you all the information you need to decide on a product, then you call them on the number down below on the support tab and there is no answer, ever. Then you request a call back amd you must wait till when then you are so irritated with the process they may as well leave it.
